answers.answer: Well I'm 5'2 and weigh 168, gained 12lbs in my pregnancy so far and I'm 20 weeks.. I think you'll be alright. Lol

question: I'm 34 years old and this is my fourth pregnancy. I'm wondering what is a healthy amount of weight I should gain? I'm 5'2 and about 125 lbs, this is actually heavy for me. I want to avoid diabetes.
title: Healthy weight gain
